context: Manufacturing company requiring new logistics partner for North American distribution network due to current vendor performance issues and capacity constraints

request.purpose: Three-year contract with new logistics provider for warehousing and transportation services
request.justification: Current vendor at 78% on-time delivery, impacting customer satisfaction and market share

decision_process.outcome: Narrowed to 3 finalist vendors with comprehensive scorecards
Selected Global Logistics Partners with optimized contract terms

business_impact.expected_outcome: Improve on-time delivery from 78% to 95%, reduce logistics costs by 12%, enhance customer satisfaction scores
business_impact.projected_value: $8.2M in cost savings and revenue protection over 3 years
business_impact.actual_value: $6.8M realized in first year through improved delivery and reduced expedited shipping costs

decision_criteria: Cost competitiveness and total cost of ownership

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: On-time delivery improved to 92%, initial cost savings of $1.2M, customer satisfaction stable during transition
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: On-time delivery at 96%, cumulative savings of $4.1M, customer NPS improved by 15 points

lessons_learned: Comprehensive vendor evaluation prevented costly mistakes, phased transition approach minimized disruption, performance-based contract terms ensured accountability
